    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Root hairs in plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wurzelhaare in den Betrieben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poils de racine aux usines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cabelos da raiz nas plantas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capelli della radice in piante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίχες ρίζας στις εγκαταστάσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pelos de la raíz en plantas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the root hairs in a radish plant where water uptake and active transport of mineral ions take place.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">active transport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">exchange surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mineral ion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radish plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">root hair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water uptake</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Wurzelhaare in einem 
Rettichbetrieb, in dem Wasserheben und aktiver Transport der 
Mineralionen stattfinden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les poils de racine à 
une usine de radis où la prise d'eau et le transport actif des ions 
minéraux ont lieu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os cabelos da raiz em uma 
planta do radish onde o uptake de água e o transporte ativo de íons 
minerais ocorram.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i capelli della radice 
in una pianta del ravanello in cui il condotto dell'acqua ed il 
trasporto attivo degli ioni minerali avvengono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρίχες ρίζας σε 
εγκαταστάσεις ραδικιών όπου η λήψη ύδατος και η ενεργός 
μεταφορά των ορυκτών ιόντων πραγματοποιούνται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los pelos de la raíz en
una planta del rábano en donde ocurren el uptake de agua y el 
transporte activo de iones mineral.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktiver Transport</string>
          </keyword>
